propositions.original_proposition: Mean income peaks in Kensington and Chelsea during the 2020-2023 period, with a 25% increase compared to the previous decade.
propositions.reworded_proposition: Kensington and Chelsea have experienced a notable rise in mean income during 2020-2023, surpassing previous decade trends.
propositions.chart_title: Income Trends in Kensington and Chelsea
propositions.chart_description: Visualize income growth in Kensington and Chelsea from 2020 to 2023.
propositions.reasoning: A line chart effectively shows the trend of income changes over time, highlighting the increase in Kensington and Chelsea.
tapas_questions: How did mean income change from 2010-2019 to 2020-2023 in Kensington and Chelsea?
Which borough had the highest mean income in 2020?
What is the average mean income across all boroughs during 2020-2023?

propositions.original_proposition: Median income in outer London boroughs increased by 15% more than inner boroughs from 2015 to 2023.
propositions.reworded_proposition: Outer London boroughs have seen a more pronounced growth in median income compared to inner boroughs over recent years.
propositions.chart_description: Comparison of median income growth between outer and inner London boroughs.
propositions.reasoning: A simple bar chart effectively compares the growth in median income between two groups over a specified period.
tapas_questions: Which borough has the highest median income growth?
How does median income growth in outer boroughs compare to inner boroughs?
What is the average median income growth across all boroughs?

propositions.original_proposition: Income growth in East London boroughs correlates with a 20% increase in local business establishments from 2010 to 2020.
propositions.reworded_proposition: In East London, rising incomes appear to be linked with a noticeable increase in local business establishments over the past decade.
propositions.chart_title: Income vs Business Growth in East London
propositions.chart_description: Exploring the relationship between income growth and business establishment increase from 2010 to 2020.
propositions.reasoning: A scatter plot effectively visualizes the relationship between two quantitative variables, such as income growth and business establishment increase.
tapas_questions: Is there a correlation between income growth and business establishment increase?
Which boroughs show the strongest relationship between income and business growth?
How did the number of business establishments change from 2010 to 2020?

propositions.original_proposition: The gap between mean and median income in Central London boroughs widened by 10% during economic downturns from 2008 to 2023.
propositions.reworded_proposition: During economic downturns from 2008 to 2023, Central London boroughs experienced a growing disparity between mean and median income levels.
propositions.chart_title: Income Disparity Trends in Central London
propositions.chart_description: Explore the widening gap between mean and median income from 2008 to 2023.
propositions.reasoning: A 3D line chart allows for the visualization of income trends over time while comparing mean and median values across multiple boroughs.
